version_description:
• Improved swipe controls: now you can tap to go forward;
• A few critical bug fixes

Thanks for playing the game and sending us all the awesome feedback with support and ideas. We read every single letter!

-= The Update of Wisps and Heroes =-

FOUR NEW HEROES are ready to join you! Unlock and upgrade them to acquire unique powers you've never wielded before and explore new ways to play!

WISPS infest the Dungeon! Fast and mischievous spirits of elemental magic will try to burn, zap, freeze or confuse you, so stay alert.

* 4 new Heroes: Rik, Captain Bragg, Medusa and... a special guest!
* 5 kinds of Wisps: Fire, Energy, Ice, Poison and Darkness,
* New kinds of hazards: Cannons and Energy Walls,
* New music track from Dave Cowen (unlock new Heroes to find it!)
* Dozens of new trap layouts to blame for numerous deaths of your Heroes ;)

* Visual improvements,
* The game is now slightly brighter,
* Fixed Cloud Sync behaviour in some scenarios,
* Balancing, optimising and bug fixing;

Thank you for playing Redungeon!

We receive lots of letters from our players daily and we love reading them, even if we're not able to reply to every letter.

We've used a lot of ideas from player feedback while making this update. Special thanks to our player Lawenard for a significant contribution to the design of one of the new Heroes!

See you in the next update!

-= The Update of Teleportation =-

You think you know the Dungeon inside out by now?

The Dungeon has evolved once again:
• TELEPORTATION just got invented!
• CONFUSION WISPS want to mess with your head.
• 200+ NEW UNIQUE TRAPS are waiting for you!

By popular request:
• Detailed statistics! The new “Achievements and Numbers” screen lets you see and share curious facts like your play time, kill counts, deaths by damage types and much more!
• A new in-game list of Achievements for a smoother achievement-hunting experience!

Also:
• Panic Bot's firmware got an update to fix battery life issues (yes, he became MUCH more powerful).
• Bragg keeps his hard-earned keys after reviving;
• Medusa gets coins from Followers;

We've also fixed many bugs, big, small and tiny, thanks to invaluable feedback from our players. Thank you!

See you next time!

Bug fixes.
Huge thanks for our players for finding and reporting them!

Minor Improvements for a better game experience.

Language localisations: you can now enjoy the game in any of theses languages: Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Polish, Ukrainian.

- iPhone X support.
- Fix restoring purchased products

Redungeon is back with even more content!
- Tons of New level modules (50+)
- Privacy policy updates
- Minor fixes
